thread.title: Peep Show stars will be back with a new comedy - called Back
thread.title_full: Peep Show stars will be back with a new comedy - called Back

title: Peep Show stars will be back with a new comedy - called Back
text:
Peep Show stars will be back with a new comedy - called Back Peep Show stars will be back with a new comedy - called Back 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Peep Show may be about to go off air after 12 years of cringe-inducing moments, but good news for fans of Robert Webb and David Mitchell – the duo are developing a new script for Channel 4. 
The show will be called Back – no word yet on what it’s about. 
The broadcaster has just signed a script development deal with the Peep Show stars, as well with Simon Blackwell, one of the contributors to the comedy. David Mitchell and Robert Webb in Peep Show (Ian West/PA) 
A source told the Radio Times: “We can’t say too much. It’s very much work in progress and there are quite a few possible ways the story could go but we have high hopes for it.” 
Peep Show is set to air its ninth and final series later this winter, after which fans will have to say goodbye to Jez and Mark.
